text: The Return of the Pink Panther is a 1975 British-American mystery comedy movie directed by Blake Edwards and is the fourth movie in The Pink Panther series. It stars Peter Sellers, Herbert Lom, Christopher Plummer, Catherine Schell, Burt Kwouk, Peter Arne, Peter Jeffrey, Graham Stark and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1975 mystery movies Category:1975 comedy movies Category:British mystery movies Category:British comedy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies directed by Blake Edwards Category:Pink Panther Category:Movies set in Asia Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in Switzerland
title: The Return of the Pink Panther
